瀬戸亮平 Ryohei Seto

  • 瀬戸亮平 Ryohei Seto
  • setoryohei@me.com

    I am a researcher working on soft-matter physics, complex fluid mechanics, and rheology with various computational methods. I am interested in non-equilibrium dissipative dynamics in soft-matter systems.
